N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 2500.2 - Disclosure of participation in a New York reportable transaction

State Regulations

Every taxpayer that has participated in a New York reportable
transaction during its taxable year is required to disclose its participation
with its tax return for that taxable year in the manner and form prescribed by
the commissioner. The fact that a transaction is a New York reportable
transaction shall not affect the legal determination of whether the taxpayer's
treatment of the transaction is proper. Notes
